entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix the catalyst FlyoutItem templates to match iOS #25057
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Flyout rendering #25053
  • iOS can't select PDF - FilePicker #25051
  • Navigating to a page with an editor bound to string with large text (64k chars) is slow on Windows. #25049

Closed

  • CarouselView IsSwipeEnabled="False" still scrolls with tab navigation #12272
    Backlog
  • Improve Dogfooding Acquisition & Configuration #10621
    Backlog
  • Make a better exception message when UseCompatibility needs to be called #5308
    .NET 9 Planning
  • HybridWebView: Support controlling F12 browser dev tools #22305
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Change default HybridWebView local address from 0.0.0.0 to something safer #24364
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [WinUI] Command on TableView only invokes once. #25037
  • [Bug] Project will build and deploy, but won't start debugging #25054
  • Accessing Deployment Files #23833
  • TappedGestureRecognizer ignores Frame's IsEnabled #21619
    Backlog
  • Migrating LegacySecureStorage on Android doesn't work #21688
    Backlog
  • The style on the switch is not working #22373
    Backlog
  • DisplayAlert throws NullReferenceException when called from `OnAppearing` #22260
    Backlog
  • NullPointer from SearchHandlerAppearanceTracker on iOS #19504
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.ImageSource.FromFile fails in iOS when image in subfolder #22887
  • DeviceDisplay.Current.MainDisplayInfoChanged not fired if app is in background (Android) #20305
  • Not able to change title bar color in MAUI UWP #19252
    Backlog
  • Windows 11 Email cannot identify the default mail app. #19643
  • WevView not allowing target="_blank" href redirects on Android #10818
    Backlog
  • Cannot deploy windows when referencing net6 and ApplicationDisplayVersion < 1.0 #10953
    Backlog
  • Selectbox is not visible when MAUI window is running on Windows 11. #10756
    Backlog
  • DataTrigger doesn't work with Style property #10124
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Match Catalyst Template to iOS for Shell Flyout Items #25056
  • [net9.0] Fix deprecated API usage for embedded fonts on iOS/Catalyst 18.0+ #25055

Merged

  • Revert "Update windows samples" #25059
  • [net9.0] Merge release rc2 to net9.0 #25028
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [housekeeping] Update & Consolidate Appium + driver versions #24817
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] Fix collectionview tests rc2 #25045
  • Remove Drag and Drop Tests from Catalyst #25039
    area-testing, testing-flakiness
  • [iOS] Fix NRE in Shell SearchHandlerAppearanceTracker #24970
    community ✨
  • Add services.AddHybridWebViewDeveloperTools() extension to enable browser dev tools #25047
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] Move HybridWebView platform code to handlers (attempt 2) #25041
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • [android] update `.aotprofile` for .NET 9 RC 2 #25035
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] Change HybridWebView default address to 0.0.0.1 #25044
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] [android] update `.aotprofile` for .NET 9 RC 2 #25043
  • Change HybridWebView default address to 0.0.0.1 #25042
    area-controls-hybridwebview

Updated

  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
    area-infrastructure
  • CollectionView Header/Footer/EmptyView issues when adding/removing items. #24830
    community ✨
  • Fix for Windows SearchBar MaxLength > 0 not working properly. #24919
    community ✨
  • CollectionView, the footer moves to the bottom of the page when the empty view or empty view template is enabled #24997
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Move to rtm #25017
  • Fix deprecated API usage for embedded fonts on iOS/Catalyst 18.0+ #25025
  • First tests (disabled) from Control Gallery to Appium #24943
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Fixed Microsoft.Maui.Controls 8.0.90 (Latest stable) Ruins Entry Controls #25006
    community ✨
  • Nested Flex Layouts #25036
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, layout-flex
  • Re-enable tests #24912
  • Add a hard liimit on the size of an Image which can be loaded #24305
    area-controls-image
  • [X] allow namescope resolution before parenting #22854
    area-xaml
